name: Convert Your Browsers into Buyers and Maximize Conversions – Quicker
author: Woooplugin

sections.description:
Quicker is an WooComerce quick check out plugin to manage easy check out process in your WooComerce store.

Quicker comes to speedup you WooCommerce Checkout from multiple steps to single step. In addition, the plugin aims to help you growing sales and revenue by growing users experince. You are able to simplify the checkout process by skipping the shopping cart page. The “Add to cart” button is added in each product to redirect customers to the checkout page. This can encourage buyers to shop more and quickly. You will increase your sales reducing cart abandonment.

There’s more coming in the plugin.

Need help adding Quicker in your WooCommerce website? 👉 Contact Us.

A few more helpful links here 👇
Live Demo | Documentation

Use of Quicker Plugin

  • 1 Click Checkout
  • Checkout Field Editor
  • Extra Fees in Checkout – Pro
  • Side Cart/Mini Cart – Pro
  • Order Bump – Pro
  • Cash On Delivery Charge – Pro
  • Product Addons (Upcoming)
  • Time Based Menu (Upcoming)
  • Multi-Step Checkout (Upcoming)
  • Pabbly Integration (Upcoming)
  • Quick View – Pro
  • Minimum/Maximum Order Amount – Pro

More features are on the way! You can see the Changelog for more update. Join us on social media to get the latest update and offers.

Current Feature

Your customers deserve a shopping experience that’s as smooth as silk. Quicker is your ultimate solution for a seamless and hassle-free WooCommerce quick checkout plugin.

👉 1 Click Checkout – One-Click Checkout allow users to purchase with a single click.

👉 Checkout Field Editor – It enables you to edit the default checkout fields of your WooCommerce platform, add new custom fields in the three sections (namely Billing, Shipping and Additional), edit, hide, or delete the default fields, change labels.

👉 Extra Fees in Checkout – WooCommerce Additional Fees allows to create required or non-required fees on checkout page.

👉 [Side Cart/Mini Cart] – Create a beautiful sliding cart for your WooCommerce store.Customer can shop smoothly with a sidebar cart.

👉 [Order Bump] – Advertise another product to the customer during checkout and boost up your sales.

👉 [Cash On Delivery Charge] – Customer will pay for the order will be made upon delivery and improve your store’s sales by providing customers with a simple, secure payment method.

👉 [Time Based Menu] – You can set timing for breakfast, lunch and dinner. If your specified lunch time is over then that menu item will not be available for the same day again.

👉 [Multi-Step Checkout] – Create a better user experience by splitting the checkout process in several steps. This will also improve your conversion rate.

👉 [Quick View] – Help Your Customers to View Products Quickly. Allow your users to interact with the products through a quick pop-up view for a better user experience.

👉 [Minimum/Maximum Order Amount] – Set a minimum order quantity for products so that you ensure the fast-moving of the inventory.

👉 [Product Add-Ons] – You can offer special options custom product input fields with various types like Text, Number, Password, Email etc..

👉 [Pabbly Integration] – Easily connect and integrate WooCommerce with different applications associated with CRM, Sales, Marketing and so on.

🔥 WHAT’S NEXT

If you like Quicker, then consider checking out other WordPress Plugins made by the same team:

🔔 Ultimate Membership – Create Members for WordPress and WooCommerce and Boost your sales
🔔 Filter Plus – It is a WordPress and WooCommerce Product Filter Plugin that allows users to add multiple filtering features like filter by Ratings, Tags, Price Range, Custom Fields etc.
🔔 Discountify – Discount Rules, Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/quicker directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. All Settings will be found in Admin sidebar -> quicker
sections.faq:
Is it compatible with all WordPress themes?

We have tested all the popular themes. And we believe, it will work with your theme if that has been well developed for WordPress and WooComerce. If you face any issue, drop us a message on our support link. Our team will take care of the compatibility issue.

short_description: Quicker is a WooComerce quick check out plugin that enable single click checkout option, edit checkout of WooCommerce and multi-step checkout.
